title: Byte Swapping Function
description: This function takes a WORD (16-bit unsigned integer) as input and returns the same WORD with its bytes swapped. The byte swapping is accomplished by rotating the input value left by 8 bits.
name: SWAP_BYTE

input.name: IN
input.description: The input WORD that will undergo byte swapping.

return_value.description: The result of the byte-swapped input WORD.
